import { Room } from '@material-ui/icons' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { db, storage, time } from './firebase' export default function AccOrder({currentUser}) { let currOrders = []; // const [currOrders, setCurrOrders] = useState(); const orderRef = db.collection('order') const orderDetailsRef = db.collection('orderDetails') const orderHistory = async () => { try{ let response = await orderRef .where("customerID", "==", `${currentUser.uid}`) .get() .then( snapshot => snapshot.forEach( item => currOrders.push(item.data()))) console.log(currOrders) }catch(error){ console.log("Error Displayong Order History: ", error) } } useEffect( () => { orderHistory() }, []) return (
